content: this simple draped neck tee is made from just two rectangles it s a classic style that can be worn many different ways grab your favorite worsted weight yarn and make this top today click here for the free version of the written pattern 1 ** or click here to grab the pdf version of the pattern in my shop 2 ** **skill level ** advanced beginner **sizing ** sizing follows the craft yarn council s standards for women s sizes #sizeinclusive instructions and yarn requirements for size x-small are given outside the parentheses with small medium large x-large 2x 3x 4x and 5x given inside the parentheses like this x-small small medium large x-large 2x 3x 4x 5x when only one number is given it applies to all sizes **you will need ** approx 730 818 925 1015 1104 1219 1310 1431 1524 yards of #4 worsted weight yarn i used lion brand jeans colors in khaki 3 4 4 5 5 5 6 6 7 skeins us size i / 5 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge scissors measuring tape yarn needle or blunt tapestry needle the dutch translation is available here 3 **this pattern is intended for your personal use only you may not share it copy it sell it give it away or mass-produce the finished product however you may sell the finished items on a small scale as long as you convey in your item description that you used a yay for yarn pattern yay for yarn copyright© 2019 current all patterns and photos are owned by yay for yarn ** 1 https //yayforyarn com/cowl-neck-tee-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //shop yayforyarn com/products/cowl-neck-tee-ladies-summer-top-pdf-crochet-pattern-video-tutorial-for-beginners 3 https //eenmooigebaar nl/yay-for-yarn/cowl-neck-tee/
